name: Nour Selim
title: Backend Engineer

Proven track record in leading backend architecture for AI-powered platforms and multi-tenant SaaS systems. Skilled in building robust APIs, implementing automation, and optimizing deployment workflows with Docker, Kubernetes, and GitLab CI/CD.

achievements: Led backend development for scalable procurement platform.
Designed & implemented full stack with Node.js and Next.js.
Built secure, isolated data access, improved readiness through logging, monitoring, and QA.
Developed backend utilities and boosted engineering efficiency.

experience.company: Deloitte Innovation Hub – Agentic Workforce Transformation
